```{r}
c2 <- read_csv("data/ISCN-c2.csv") %>% 
    janitor::clean_names()

```

```{r str}

str(c2)

```
```{r}

c2 %>% 
  select(clay_tot_psa_percent) %>% 
  filter()

```

```{r}

clay <- drop_na(c2, clay_tot_psa_percent)

ggplot(clay, aes(clay_tot_psa_percent))+

  theme_bw()

```

```{r}

ggplot(clay, aes(state_state_province)) +

```
